Text.Page:
Atel Akaad have stuck their noses in here. I want you to show them they're not wanted!

Engage {@LinkCreature:39#210#vrentsuul sorcerers}, {@LinkCreature:39#220#lancers}, {@LinkCreature:39#230#priests}, and {@LinkCreature:39#240#berserkers} in and around Wary Vigil.

Report to Ordinio at Retribution Point when your mission is complete.
At this rate, we'll drive them all out and go home to a good dinner. Thank you.

I'd like you to concentrate on {@LinkCreature:39#210#arachnen sorcerers}, {@LinkCreature:39#220#lancers}, {@LinkCreature:39#230#priests}, and {@LinkCreature:39#240#berserkers}. You'll find them in Wary Vigil.

Bring proof of their deaths back to me anytime for a reward.
